DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , safety pharmacokinetics ABT-450/r give together ABT-267 without RBV treatment-naïve participant genotype 1 , 2 3 chronic HCV infection .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Paritaprevir With Ritonavir ( ABT-450/r ) When Given Together With Ombitasvir With Without Ribavirin ( RBV ) Treatment-Naïve Participants With Genotype 1 , 2 3 Chronic Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV )
DOC.detailed_description: This 2 sequential arm , combination treatment study arm contain 3 cohort : one HCV genotype 1 , 2 , 3 . The study consist 2 phase , treatment phase post-treatment phase . The treatment phase design explore antiviral activity , safety pharmacokinetics ABT-450/r dose combination ABT-267 without RBV 12 week . The post-treatment phase design monitor evaluate Sustained Virologic Response ( SVR ) 12 , SVR 24 , evolution persistence viral resistance ABT-267 ABT-450 HCV genotype 1- , 2- , 3-infected participant expose ABT-267 ABT-450/r . Arms 1 2 enrol sequentially .
DOC.criteria: Participants body mass index 18 < 35 kg/m^2 . Females either postmenopausal least 2 year , surgically sterile , willing use least 2 effective form birth control . Males must surgically sterile agree use least 2 effective form birth control throughout course study . Participants condition general good health , HCV infection . Participants chronic HCV genotype 1 , 2 , 3 infection least 6 month , plasma HCV RNA > 50,000 IU/mL , FibroTest score < = 0.72 aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) platelet ratio index < = 2 , Fibroscan® result < 9.6 kilopascal ( kPa ) , absence cirrhosis base liver biopsy . Positive drug screen Previous use antiHCV agent History cardiac disease History uncontrolled diabetes diabetes require insulin Abnormal laboratory result Females pregnant plan become pregnant within 6 month last dose study drug/RBV breastfeeding ; male whose partner pregnant would become pregnant within 6 month last dose study drug/RBV Positive test result hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) antihuman immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody ( Ab ) . Negative HIV status confirm screening .
